Test automation as a service

What do you need to automate? Describe step by step

Ok, go to Telegram discussion

In 24 hours QA.GURU engineers will automate your tests. So, you will get:

  • Framework & tests code (Github)
  • Ability to run tests in our infrastructure (Jenkins, Selenoid)
  • Results visualization with test details, screenshots, logs, videos (Allure)
  • Integration with your Issue-tracker (Jira etc.)
  • Slack / Telegram / Skype / Email notifications


Got Questions? Here is an example project & chat
